column2: It had been a month since Star Man and his friends moved into the DirectNex Seaside Cave.

Drawing on everything they had learned so far, their lives quickly stabilized.
Once they had a bit of breathing room, Star Man decided to visit the Precision Ruins.

His aim was to retrieve weapons and tools, but in truth they could simply make new ones, so there was no real need for a recovery mission.
Star Man just wanted to see what had become of their old home.
